      • getItems

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double> getItems​(java.lang.Double fillFactor)
        Description copied from interface: Storage
        Returns a list of items based on their fill factor. This method is used by the fridge to display items that are running low and need to be replenished. getItems( 0.5 ) - will return any items that are 50% or less full, including items that are depleted. Unless all available containers are empty, this method should only consider the non-empty containers when calculating the overall fillFactor for a given item.
        Specified by:
        getItems in interface Storage
        Returns:
        a map of item type to its fill factor
        See Also:
        com.discoverorg.smartfridge.Storage#getItems(java.lang.Double)
